1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Basic relmap operators.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Bundle
6  ( ropsFlat,
7  ) where
8
9import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                 as D
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core                 as C
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base             as Rop
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Check       as Rop
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Control     as Rop
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Elem        as Rop
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Lattice     as Rop
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Gadget      as Rop
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Meta        as Rop
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Order       as Rop
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Peripheral  as Rop
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Resource    as Rop
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Source      as Rop
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Term        as Rop
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.TermGadget  as Rop
24
25-- | Basic relmap operators.
26ropsFlat :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
27ropsFlat = Rop.ropsMeta
28        ++ Rop.ropsResource
29        ++ Rop.ropsCheck
30        ++ Rop.ropsPeripheral
31        ++ Rop.ropsElem
32        ++ Rop.ropsControl
33        ++ Rop.ropsGadget
34        ++ Rop.ropsOrder
35        ++ Rop.ropsTerm
36        ++ Rop.ropsTermGadget
37        ++ Rop.ropsLattice
38        ++ Rop.ropsSource
39        ++ Rop.ropsBuiltin
40
